Games Rules Welcome!
Welcome to Guess K-pop app! In this application, you can test your knowledge of K-pop. In this application, you are offered 3 main game modes: "\n" 1) Guess the Star "\n" 2) Guess the Group "\n" 3) Assign to groups "\n" With these game modes, you can memorize all of K-pop most famous bands, as well as all of their incredible members! "\n" Each game mode has achievements! "\n" Good luck!
//scorestuff Your score
TwoBandsTinder
Achievement unlocked!
Новый рекорд! Поздравляем! Вы достигли нового рекорда: Конец игры Ваш счет: Ваш рекорд: Описание режима
Guess the Star game mode lets you test your knowledge of K-pop stars. "\n" Guess the names of K-pop artists from photos. It is not important for you to know which group a star is on screen, but it is important to know his or her name. Each artist you guess will increase your score! A wrong guess, accordingly, reduces. But I think you can figure it out. "\n" Guess them all!
Guess the Group game mode lets you test your knowledge of the most famous K-pop groups in history! "\n" Guess the group the star is on the screen. Each correct answer will increase your score! And the wrong one, accordingly, reduces. But I think you can figure it out. "\n" Guess them all!
The game mode "Assign by Groups" allows you to test your knowledge of K-pop groups "\n" You are given a set of different K-pop stars, and you need to divide them into 2 groups. To distribute the artist cards, you need to swipe them to the corresponding K-pop group on the side of the screen. "\n" At any time, you can view all artist cards and redistribute them. If you distribute the cards incorrectly, you will also be asked to correct the result. But with each new attempt, the potential score will get smaller. "\n" But I think you can figure it out. "\n" Distribute them all!
